componentviewer.config.title: Component Viewer Config
componentviewer.config.tooltips.advanced: The debug option "Advanced tooltips" has to be enabled to display components.
componentviewer.config.tooltips.colored_: Colored SNBT values just like "/data get".
componentviewer.config.tooltips.componen: Only non-default components will be displayed.
Component values will be displayed in addition to component types.
Specifies the display behavior of components.

- Never: Components will never be displayed

- Hold: Components will be displayed when holding CTRL

- Always: Components will always be displayed
componentviewer.config.tooltips.formatti:
Specifies how component values should be formatted.

- SNBT: Using an SNBT representation just like "/data get"

- Object: Using Java's Object.toString() method
componentviewer.config.tooltips.indentat: The amount of spaces used for indentation. A value of zero means no indentation, essentially creating a one-liner.
componentviewer.config.tooltips.title: Tooltips
componentviewer.tooltips.components.erro: Object formatting error: Displaying non-formatted value
componentviewer.tooltips.components.head: Component Changes:
Components:
